Bio

Mike is a Director of Software Engineering at the Capital One Center for Machine Learning, where he leads a team of engineers building scalable data science and machine learning foundational libraries for the enterprise. He also contributes to open source software projects in the PyData ecosystem. Mike holds two bachelor’s degrees in computer science and physics, and has over 15 years of experience in software engineering and scientific computing in astronomy, computational sciences, data science, machine learning, and enterprise products.
